content: unexpected day off by rodica iosif materials  100g fingering/ 4ply sock yarn 400 or 420 meters/ 100 g  us size 1/ 2 25mm needles  stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 32 st x 44 row per 4 / 10 cm in stockinette st sizes small 60 st med 1 64 st med 2 68 st large 72 st the pattern is a multiple of 4 st stitch key and abbreviations bor beginning of round co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together m1 pick the bar from the previous row between the stitch you have just knit and the next stitch lift it on the left needle then knit it through the back loop you have increased one st p purl pm place marker patt pattern p2tog purl 2 stitches together round/r round s or row for knit flat for the heel ssk slip 2 stitches knit-wise one at a time then knit slipped stitches together through the back loops sm slip marker sl1 slip one stitch from left to right needle as if to purl st stitch s please do not sell distribute copy etc this pattern without permission @4crinialbi 1 unexpected day off by rodica iosif w&t wrap and turn  on a knit row facing you  slip next st from left to right needle bring the yarn from back to front turn slip same st back on left needle and start purling next row you don t knit this slipped st  on a purl row facing you slip next st from left to right needle bring yarn from front to back turn slip the same st back on right needle and start knitting next row you don t knit this slipped st note 1 please read ahead to plan when to start mini-gusset increases note 2 please make sure that you read and follow instructions for the short row heel as it is different from w&t heel that knitters are used to cuff use your favourite method and co 60 64 68 72 st join to knit in the round being careful not to twist distribute st equally between the needles to have half for the instep and half for the back of the sock /sole pm for bor knit k1 p1 ribbing for 14 rounds or desired cuff length leg knit as per chart and/or written instructions page 4 make the leg as long as you wish mini-gusset start it when you have knit about 2 5 2 75 / 6 -7cm less to the turning point of your heel this mini-gusset will give you 6 more st over the back of the sock for the short-row heel keep knitting in patt over the instep and stockinette on the back of foot/sole bor at the beginning of instep increase round one k 30 32 34 36 instep st k1 m1 k 28 30 32 34 m1 k1 = total of 32 34 36 38 for the back/sole knit 4 more
